Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) are promising for directly producing electricity and require sealing materials with long-term stability at high temperatures and in corrosive environments.
Titulo: Kinetics of crack healing for self-repair in glass-yttria stabilized zirconia composites for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Glass seals are promising but suffer from fracture because of the low fracture toughness.
Titulo: Kinetics of crack healing for self-repair in glass-yttria stabilized zirconia composites for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: To overcome this limitation, our group has advanced a novel approach of self-repairable glass seals and related theoretical model for the SOFC.
Titulo: Kinetics of crack healing for self-repair in glass-yttria stabilized zirconia composites for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: This approach is used for the first time to study the kinetics of crack healing and self-repair behaviors in glass-yttria stabilized zirconia (YSZ-10-30 wt%) composites.
Titulo: Kinetics of crack healing for self-repair in glass-yttria stabilized zirconia composites for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The addition of inert YSZ particles enhances the toughness and viscosity of the glass and helps in tailoring the crack healing response for the SOFC.
Titulo: Kinetics of crack healing for self-repair in glass-yttria stabilized zirconia composites for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The viscosities of glass-YSZ composites are extracted from the healing model and compared with the viscosity obtained independently from the dilatometric measurements and densification data using sintering models for demonstrating good agreement with the predictions of the model.
Titulo: Kinetics of crack healing for self-repair in glass-yttria stabilized zirconia composites for solid oxide fuel cell
